price: Lakini walio zikataa Ishara zetu, hao ndio watu wa shari wa kushotoni.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
footnotes: Na walio zikataa dalili tulizo zisimamisha kuthibitisha Haki kutoka na Kitabu na hoja zake, hao ndio wapotovu watu waovu walio kosa kheri na watapata adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
